har_gow.name: Crystal Shrimp Dumplings
har_gow.description: chinese food, har gow, translucent crystal skin dumplings, plump pink shrimp visible through delicate wrapper, perfect pleated edges, glistening with steam, bamboo steamer, 4 pristine pieces, dim sum perfection, juicy succulent filling, restaurant quality, white tablecloth background

xiaolongbao.name: Soup Dumplings
xiaolongbao.description: chinese food, xiaolongbao, delicate soup dumplings, thin translucent skin holding rich broth, 18 precise pleats on top, bamboo steamer lined with cabbage, steam rising, golden chicken broth visible, tender pork filling, shanghai delicacy, white marble table

siu_mai.name: Pork & Shrimp Shumai
siu_mai.description: chinese food, siu mai, golden topped dumplings, juicy pork and shrimp filling, orange crab roe garnish, open-faced beauty, bamboo steamer, glistening with savory juices, perfect yellow wrapper, dim sum classic, restaurant presentation

char_siu_bao.name: BBQ Pork Buns
char_siu_bao.description: chinese food, char siu bao, fluffy white steamed buns, split open revealing glossy red bbq pork, honey-glazed char siu filling, pillowy soft dough, steam wisps, bamboo steamer, 3 perfect buns, sweet and savory, white background

dan_dan_noodles.name: Sichuan Dan Dan Noodles
dan_dan_noodles.description: chinese food, dan dan noodles, silky wheat noodles, rich red chili oil pooling, savory minced pork, crushed peanuts, vibrant green scallions, sesame paste coating, aromatic sichuan peppercorns, white ceramic bowl, appetizing presentation

lo_mein.name: Cantonese Lo Mein
lo_mein.description: chinese food, lo mein, glossy egg noodles, wok-charred edges, colorful crisp vegetables, tender chicken slices, rich brown sauce coating, bean sprouts, scallions, steam rising, white plate, restaurant style

kung_pao.name: Kung Pao Chicken
kung_pao.description: chinese food, kung pao chicken, glistening cubed chicken, vibrant dried red chilies, roasted peanuts, glossy soy glaze, fresh scallions, sichuan peppercorns visible, rich mahogany sauce, white porcelain plate, steam rising, restaurant quality

general_tso.name: General Tso's Chicken
general_tso.description: chinese food, general tso chicken, crispy golden battered chicken, thick glossy sweet-spicy glaze, sesame seed garnish, bright broccoli florets, caramelized edges, steam rising, white rice side, elegant plating, restaurant presentation

orange_chicken.name: Orange Chicken
orange_chicken.description: chinese food, orange chicken, crispy battered chicken pieces, bright orange citrus glaze, fresh orange zest, caramelized coating, green onion garnish, glistening sauce, white serving plate, vibrant colors, appetizing presentation

lemon_chicken.name: Cantonese Lemon Chicken
lemon_chicken.description: chinese food, lemon chicken, golden crispy chicken breast, bright yellow lemon sauce, fresh lemon slices, light cornstarch coating, glossy citrus glaze, garnished with parsley, white plate, elegant presentation, cantonese style

mongolian_beef.name: Mongolian Beef
mongolian_beef.description: chinese food, mongolian beef, tender beef strips, rich dark sauce, caramelized onions, fresh green scallions, glossy soy glaze, slight char, aromatic steam, white plate, restaurant quality, appetizing colors

beef_and_broccoli.name: Beef & Broccoli
beef_and_broccoli.description: chinese food, beef and broccoli, tender marinated beef slices, bright green broccoli florets, rich brown oyster sauce, glossy coating, sesame oil sheen, steam rising, white rice accompaniment, classic presentation

yangzhou_fried_rice.name: Yangzhou Fried Rice
yangzhou_fried_rice.description: chinese food, yangzhou fried rice, golden egg-coated rice, colorful diced char siu, plump shrimp, bright green peas, fluffy separated grains, wok hei aroma, garnished with scallions, white plate, restaurant style

spring_rolls.name: Crispy Spring Rolls
spring_rolls.description: chinese food, spring rolls, golden crispy wrapper, shatteringly crunchy, diagonal cut showing colorful vegetable filling, sweet chili sauce, fresh lettuce garnish, grease-free, perfectly fried, white plate presentation

honey_walnut_shrimp.name: Honey Walnut Shrimp
honey_walnut_shrimp.description: chinese food, honey walnut shrimp, plump crispy shrimp, creamy white sauce, candied walnuts, golden tempura coating, sweet mayo glaze, garnished with sesame seeds, elegant plating, restaurant quality

wonton_soup.name: Wonton Soup
wonton_soup.description: chinese food, wonton soup, clear golden broth, plump pork wontons, fresh bok choy, sliced scallions, sesame oil drops, steam rising, white ceramic bowl, comforting warmth, traditional presentation

egg_tart.name: Chinese Egg Tarts
egg_tart.description: chinese food, egg tarts, golden flaky pastry, silky smooth custard, perfectly caramelized top, delicate layers visible, 4 tarts on white plate, bakery fresh, portuguese-chinese fusion, appetizing golden color

bubble_tea.name: Brown Sugar Bubble Tea
bubble_tea.description: chinese food, bubble tea, creamy milk tea, dark brown sugar syrup swirls, black tapioca pearls, condensation on glass, wide straw, marble pattern, fresh and cold, taiwanese style, white background
